item.description:
Hello Everyone,

I've re-scheduled brunch at The Post Office Cafe in East Greenwich. Our group has brunched there before, over a year ago, and it was a nice event.

This is a Brunch Buffet - $19.95 per person

Here's some info:

Brunch includes:

A breakfast line consisting of assorted pastries, breads, bagels, and traditional hearty items of scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage and homefries. A lavish display of salads, antipasto station and smoked sausage separate the breakfast line from the lunch line which always includes a chicken dish, a fish dish, a vegetable dish, and a chef carving station of seasonal meats.

The omelet station and waffles are made to order, and lastly, an array of house made desserts that will most likely need to be visited several times during your visit!

http://www.pinellimar...

We'll meet in the lobby, I've made a reservation in my name.
item.how_to_find_us: A reservation has been made in my name
item.name: October Brunch - Post Office Cafe in East Greenwich
